column5: My place is close to Morgans Point Resort Marina, Belton Lake Paddling trails, Scott and White Hospital (20min drive), Deadfish grill, Belton Lake Outdoor Recreation Area, Mary-Harden Baylor College. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the coziness, the high ceilings, the view of Belton Lake, the lake access, the quiet neighborhood, the deck and patio and the fireplace.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. There are kayaks available for rent.
